import React from 'react'; const sampleTasks = [ { id: 1, title: 'Follow up with Alice', due: '2024-07-01', status: 'Pending', assigned: 'Bob Smith' }, { id: 2, title: 'Send proposal to Emma', due: '2024-07-03', status: 'Completed', assigned: 'Carol Lee' }, { id: 3, title: 'Schedule demo', due: '2024-07-05', status: 'In Progress', assigned: 'David Kim' }, ]; const Tasks: React.FC = () => { return (

Tasks

{sampleTasks.map((task) => ( ))}
Title Due Date Status Assigned To Actions
{task.title} {task.due} {task.status} {task.assigned}
); }; export default Tasks;
